title: How Sounds Affect Us
teaser: From the sizzle of a hot fajita in a restaurant to the thud of our neighbor's feet in the apartment upstairs, noise is an inescapable part of our lives. But Joy Cardin's guest says sound is much more than noise; it can be the difference between a bad movie and a good one, and influences everything from how our food tastes to which seat we choose on a crowded bus. He and Joy discuss the influence of sound, and how we can take charge of our personal sound landscapes.
